title: School Rumble: Ichi Gakki Hoshuu (Dub)
alternative_title: School Rumble OVA, School Rumble: First Extra Term, スクールランブル一学期補習
description: This two-part OVA is a series of shorts in relation to the School Rumble series. This OVA fills in gaps with new content between episodes from beginning to nearly the end.
